About Me

A bit about myself....

Read below to know more

Hello, I am Kailash Patel, born in Kuchch (Gujarat) and living in Mumbai. I am an experienced data analyst, a website and digital designer, and a digital marketer. During my college time, I did marketing for the yearly college festival and then, I started taking some freelancing projects on marketing in the digital space. With this, I started building websites, and worked with some startups for marketing their website to rank well on Google. Apart from marketing and designing websites, I have experience working with BFSI Canada Sector for the data analysis projects.

Apart from working on the projects, in my free time, I like to travel and trek around India with family, friends and sometimes solo. Also, an avid foodie who loves to eat both local and international foods to get more idea on what the food is, how it is made, and its ingredients. When I am indoor, I like to play sports like Cricket and Soccer, read fictional and business books, watch and provide reviews of movies. Sometimes, I watch sports and a fan of Liverpool team.

Award 1

Received award as the star performer of the year for effectively handling of the project, and quick learning.

Award 2

Received award for making the startup website rank first on Google within 1.5 months of the development and provided them good conversion rate of the visitors to the site.

Award 3

Awarded as a best performer at fun activities in my current organization.
